tidbits.title: Strategic Location
tidbits.description: Gibraltar is strategically located at the southern tip of the Iberian Peninsula, serving as a vital naval base and a key point for maritime trade.

tidbits.title: The Rock of Gibraltar
tidbits.description: The iconic Rock of Gibraltar is a prominent feature, offering stunning views and housing various caves, including the famous St. Michael's Cave.

tidbits.title: British Territory
tidbits.description: As a British Overseas Territory, Gibraltar has a blend of British and Spanish influences, seen in its culture, language, and diverse population.
